title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - Cluj-Napoca, Romania
description:
We invite you to the Global Day of Coderetreat in Cluj-Napoca (https://www.facebook.com/gdcr.cluj/)! 
Please register for this event using the RABS website (http://www.rabs.ro/events?ee=18). 
Coderetreat is a day-long, intensive practice event, focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design. By providing developers the opportunity to take part in focused practice, away from the pressures of 'getting things done', the coderetreat format (http://archive.coderetreat.org/) has proven itself to be a highly effective means of skill improvement. Practicing the basic principles of modular and object-oriented design, developers can improve their ability to write code that minimizes the cost of change over time.  
Don't forget to let your fellow developers on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/events/1807892932780099/) know about it!
